name: Customize Twenty Seventeen
author: BoldThemes

sections.description:
Customize Twenty Seventeen theme – add Google Fonts, use new templates and get other options to easily customize your site.

This plugin simplifies customization of Twenty Seventeen theme by giving you additional Customizer options including the usage of Google Fonts, and additional page templates.

Create your premium looking website using only Twenty Seventeen theme

Check out our demo pages built with Twenty Seventeen theme and Bold Page Builder plugin:

  • Wedding 2017 Demo
  • Accommodation 2017 Demo
  • Construction 2017 Demo

Our demos also use the following free plugin:

  • Bold Page Builder plugin

New Templates

Customize Twenty Seventeen adds additional page templates which can be selected on page edit:

  1. Boxed
  2. Wide
  3. Fullscreen

Customization Options

Also it will add new customization section (BoldThemes Settings) with following options:

  1. Body font
  2. Title font
  3. Heading font
  4. Menu font
  5. Remove entry header
  6. Remove home fullscreen
  7. Menu position – default (left), right and centered
  8. Custom CSS (for WP 4.7-)
  9. Custom JS

Options allow you to change the visual appearance of pages and add custom JavaScript and CSS code without creating a child theme or editing theme files. Easily add Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel or similar without theme files modification.

Actively developed and supported

Customize Twenty Sixteen is actively developed by BoldThemes , authors of a number of free and premium WordPress themes and plugins.
sections.installation:
Use WordPress Add New Plugin feature and search Customize Twenty Seventeen or download the archive and:

  1. Unzip the archive on your computer
  2. Upload bt_customize_2017 directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress

  • Improved templates CSS.

  • Initital release.
